mapper.select: SELECT violation_type AS violationType, CAST(COUNT(*) AS SIGNED) AS cnt, CAST(COALESCE(SUM(credit), 0) AS SIGNED) AS creditSum FROM user_violations GROUP BY violation_type ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT id, user_id AS userId, violation_type AS violationType, description, evidence, punish, credit, record_time AS recordTime, create_time AS createTime FROM user_violations WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY record_time DESC
